ComicInfo.Summary:
A mysterious corporation known as Zenith Corp., run by Ivan Seethe, has suddenly emerged in various cities all over the world. Little is known about Seethe or his corporation except for his unethical, underhanded business practices. He is also a relic connoisseur and takes great pride hin his vast collection. Now he has set his eyes on possessing the Three Books of Peril, which are believed to possess extraordinary powers. Little does Warrior Nun Areala know that one of the books is locked securely within the Church's vault, and that Seethe will stop at NOTHING to obtain it and use it towards his ULTIMATE goal! Join Areala and the rest of the characters of the Warrior Nun universe in an epic 4-part battle to possess the Three Books of Peril. Who will be the one to claim the greatest power the Earth has ever known?
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/warrior-nun-areala-1-books-of-peril-part-one-the-b/4000-345611/
